thread.title: Before Rangoon's Miss Julia, meet the original 'Hunterwali'
thread.title_full: Before Rangoon's Miss Julia, meet the original 'Hunterwali'

title: Before Rangoon's Miss Julia, meet the original 'Hunterwali'
text:
Before Rangoon's Miss Julia, meet the original 'Hunterwali' Before Rangoon's Miss Julia, meet the original 'Hunterwali' x
Vishal Bhardwaj's Rangoon has landed in legal soup after Wadia Movietone accused the makers of setting Kangana Ranaut's character Miss Julia on 1940s actor Fearless Nadia. Ever since the trailer of Rangoon came out, the striking similarity between Kangana's character and Fearless Nadia cannot be ignored. From costumes to her mannerisms, everything about Miss Julia reminds of the original Hunterwali. As makers and film production company Wadia Movietone fight it out in the court, we take a look back at the life of India cinema's first stunt woman.
